description: This test file contains unit tests for the AttendanceProvider class in a Flutter application, mocking database interactions to verify functionality related to loading, updating, and retrieving attendance data.

classes.name: AttendanceProvider
classes.description: A provider class managing attendance data, including loading, updating, and querying attendance records.

methods.name: loadAttendance
methods.description: Loads attendance data for a specified date, or all data if no date is provided.

methods.name: getAttendanceForDate
methods.description: Retrieves all attendance records for a specific date.

methods.name: getAttendanceForStudent
methods.description: Retrieves attendance record for a specific student on a given date.

methods.name: getAttendanceStats
methods.description: Provides statistics of attendance statuses for a specific date.
